question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Malaria Day (WMD)?
option2: Invest in the future: defeat malaria
explanation: The theme od World Malaria Day (WMD) 2017 is "End malaria for good". According to World Health Organisation (WHO), nearly four lakh people die of malaria every year in the world. Tackling malaria is improving with a 29% drop in mortality rates between 2010 and 2015 and a 21% global decrease in cases. In India, every year close to one million people suffer from this diseases. Malaria caused by the falciparum parasite is the most serious, and can lead to breathing problems, liver failure, coma and eventual death.
